title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct limits of 0 and 3 on an integral of v(t) or |v(t)| or substitutes t = 0 and t = 3 in x(t)

distance = ∫ 0 3 | v ( t ) | dt = ∫ 0 3 | 3 t 2 − 2 t − 1 | dt = 17

or

v(t)=3 t 2 −2t−1=0 t=− 1 3 ,t=1 x(0)=1−1−1+3=2 x(3)=27−9−3+3=18 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWG2b GaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaaG4maiaadshadaahaaWcbeqa aiaaikdaaaGccqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiDaiabgkHiTiaaigdacqGH9a qpcaaIWaaabaGaamiDaiabg2da9iabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaGymaaqa aiaaiodaaaGaaiilaiaadshacqGH9aqpcaaIXaaabaGaamiEaiaacI cacaaIWaGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaigdacqGHsislcaaIXaGaeyOeI0Ia aGymaiabgUcaRiaaiodacqGH9aqpcaaIYaaabaGaamiEaiaacIcaca aIZaGaaiykaiabg2da9iaaikdacaaI3aGaeyOeI0IaaGyoaiabgkHi TiaaiodacqGHRaWkcaaIZaGaeyypa0JaaGymaiaaiIdaaaaa@6377@

1 point is earned for the correct handling of the change in direction at student's turning point

1 point is earned for the correct answer

distance = (3 - 2) + (18 - 2) = 17
